ItemTooltips.boots: Since Gyro is ranged im always that much closer to safety, so boots are mostly for chasing this early in the game. That's why I usually dont pick them up until after Ring of Aquila. But again, depending on my opponents I might just go for boots earlier aswell if i feel the extra speed is crucial.
ItemTooltips.tango: Some regen with the spare money to keep myself at a reasonable health level.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Threads because the extra health is nice and the attack speed increase is good too.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: The shield provides a small increase in damage and gives some helpful mitigation against harassing and creeps. Sometimes I pick this up before I upgrade to Ring of Aquila but it really depends on what you're up against on the lane and how much they harass.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: I start with a Ring of Basilius for the little extra manaregen which lets me use abilities a little more often. And the 2 armor really helps lowering harassment damage on me.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Can be picked up if you feel like they always disable you in teamfights making you basically useless.
ItemTooltips.sphere: To avoid the occasional stun and get a helpful increase of all stats I usually pick this up as a 6th item replacing the Shield. The regen is also very helpful.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Butterly is usually the last item I have time to pick up before the game ends. Butterly is a pretty obvious choice for most agility based heroes including Gyro.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Crystalys/Daedalus gives a great increase in damage for flak cannon spamming as well as crit which is really useful in fights.
ItemTooltips.manta: A great combination of survability and offensive potential. The extra speed is really good aswell for chasing and escaping.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: In public games people dont buy that much dust and sentry wards, so a Shadow Blade is really useful. When I get the Shadow Blade I switch my Threads to agility as I no longer need the extra health to stay alive when I can safely retreat invisible. This is really great for solo farming/pushing lanes.
ItemTooltips.satanic: If you feel you need extra survability and beat someone in an all out auto-attack duel. This is what you want.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: If you feel like you dont need more survability and want to equip yourself with a pair of machine guns. A Mjollnir is what you're looking for. Should be replacing Ring of Aquila or Shield.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Upgrading my Ring of Basilius into a Ring of Aquila is cheap and gives a nice increase to my damage.
